Amazon.com: Pond Armor
s: Pond Armor manufacturers Pond Shield, a non-toxic epoxy coating used to waterproof a variety of water features such as ponds, pools, fountains, tanks, aquariums, aquaponics, hydroponics, streams, lakes, and a lot more. It is both fish and plant safe and easy to use.
